job.title: Sr Software Engineer

job.description: ltstronggtltugtCompany DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtServiceNow is making the world of work work better for people Our cloudbased platform and solutions deliver digital employeesampapos lives in significant and important ways With over 6900 customers we serve approximately 80 of the Fortune 500 and weampaposre on the 2020 list of FORTUNE Worldampaposs Most Admired CompaniesltbrgtltbrgtWere looking for people who are ready to jump right in and help us build on our incredible momentum our diverse engaged workforce and our purpose to make the world of work work betterltbrgtltbrgtLearn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNowltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtWhat you get to do in this roleltstronggtltstronggt  ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe ServiceNow developers primary responsibility will be to develop scoped applications that can integrate between ServiceNow and other enterprise business systems This role will also be responsible for the enablement of new modules support enhancements and the development of integrations that will leverage new and existing platform APIsltbrgtltulgtltligt Develop scoped applications that will utilize all of the ServiceNows platform functionalityltligtltligt Develop and support the integration of 3rd party systems with ServiceNow MID server web services REST and SSH actionsltligtltligt Create and maintain API and data integrations between ServiceNow and other servicesltligtltligt Be a lead contributor on how ServiceNow can be used to integrate to new and existing technologiesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtTo be successful in this role you haveltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt At least 4 years of handson experience with the development configuration implementation and support of production and nonproduction ServiceNow instancesltligtltligt At least 4 years of handson experience with JavaScript HTML and CSS are requiredltligtltligt A rich knowledge of both ITIL and ITSM disciplines is requiredltligtltligt ServiceNow Application Developer and System Administrator Certifications are nice to haveltligtltligt Demonstrated proficiency with the use and management of APIsltligtltligt Knowledge of infrastructure services spanning servers storage network security and cloudltbrgtltligtltulgtFD21ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAdditional InformationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtServiceNow is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive
